Shade:YorickSkull.NAME: Yorick's Skull
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with a #yZombie. Whenever you play #b10 cards, summon a #yZombie.

Shade:YorickPolishedSkull.NAME: Yorick's Polished Skull
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with 1 #yZombie and 2 #ySkeletons. Whenever you play #b10 cards, summon 1 #yZombie and 2 #ySkeletons.

Shade:Thing.NAME: Thing
DESCRIPTIONS: When you #yUnearth a card from your exhaust to your hand or deck, gain #b3 #yBlock.
